(2) a. at: actor topic (the agent is the subject)
ny vary ho an'ny ankizy ny vehivavy.
past.at.buy det rice for acc'det child det woman
`The woman bought rice for the children.'

b. tt: theme topic (the theme is the subject)
vehivavy ho an'ny ankizy ny vary.

`The woman bought rice for the children.'

`The woman bought rice for the children.'

(19) Nanoroka ny reniny i Koto; toraka izany koa i Soa.
past.at.kiss det mother.3(gen) Koto same that also Soa
`Koto kissed her mother; Soa did so too.'
= Soa kissed Soa's mother. (sloppy reading = bound variable)
= Soa kissed Koto's mother. (strict reading = referential)
